Trade/Device Name(s): Clever Choice Voice+ S Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Clever Choice+ S Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Clever Choice Voice+ M Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Clever Choice+ M Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Clever Choice Voice+ S Blood Glucose Meter
Clever Choice+ S Blood Glucose Meter
Clever Choice Voice+ M Blood Glucose Meter
Clever Choice+ M Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Clever Choice Voice+ S/M and Clever Choice+ S/M Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems for quantitative glucose measurement in fresh capillary whole blood using electrochemical technology.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from various sites for self-testing at home or multiple-patient professional use as an aid to monitor diabetes control; not for diagnosis or neonatal use.
